exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 = true <-> b2 = true -> b1 = b2" on hypothesis of type "true = true".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 = true <-> b2 = true -> b1 = b2" on hypothesis of type "(n == cn) = true".

original: intros. unfold core_state_to_data in *. intros H1 H2. unfold core_state_to_data in H1, H2. destruct (n == cn) eqn:E1, (n == cn) eqn:E2. - apply Bool.eq_true_iff_eq in E1. apply Bool.eq_true_iff_eq in E2.
